subject: Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
Dog Sledding
lead_paragraph: The four-time winner Martin Buser was the first musher to leave the checkpoint at the halfway point in the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race in Alaska.
snippet: The four-time winner Martin Buser was the first musher to leave the checkpoint at the halfway point in the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race in Alaska.
